#Load libraries

#Read in data
```{r}
#Free dataset from link below
#https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/niketchauhan/covid-19-time-series-data
dt <- read.table("time-series-19-covid-combined.csv",header=TRUE,sep=",",stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

head(dt)
```


```{r}

summary(dt)
```
